file_content.text: I am the memory. I have Rukil's descriptions. I know there was a city once. I know a city is many houses, many people. I am the only one.
Now there is just us. We have stopped having children. The old records say it is from "tak-sick radie-achon."
We once called this the Promised Land. It was a lie. It is our grave.
[This doesn't seem like a natural rock formation. It looks like there is something buried here.]
